>You don’t want to experiment with a client’s API key. Do it on a test account
Jeff Ausura of HubSpot
For more information on using test accounts, check this out <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/faq/how-do-i-create-a-test-account>

<@U3PKJ8EQL> we have this question from the youtube stream , sent in by <@UK3KAAFRP> "Jeff Ausura — I’d be very interested in the course you mentioned about using the HS API. Would love to connect if you have advice for API beginners."

Interesting factoids about Gregory most probably don’t know, but I think are really cool:
• Led the development of the new <http://WordPress.com|WordPress.com> dashboard (Calypso) including the build process, development experience, editor, and core framework.
• Contributed to the WordPress project in particular developed improvements to the editing experience when working with media for WordPress 3.9.
